how we came to know about the dependencies of the project (for deployment purposes)

os vs sys
    Frequently used methods in both

string to callable_function conversion


can we call a variable with the id() - No

dryrun command in python -

## Solved

`command` - mapping from shell scripting - exec()

pydoc module
    - part of anaconda

method vs function
    method - in classes
    functions - independent functions

Linux directory structure is case-sensitive or not
    It's case sensitive
